description: r(n), where exists one-parameter family of strategic partitions (k+p(n)+q(n), k+q(n), r(n)) for k = 0,1,2,... in Chomp.
comments: Conjectured to be complementary to h(n), see A029902.Maybe the conjecture is false - see the Brouwer link. - _Andries E. Brouwer_, May 31 2002
references: E. R. Berlekamp, J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, Winning Ways vol. 2, 598-600.
M. Gardner, Mathematical Games, Sci. Amer. (Jan, May 1973).
author: _Fred Lunnon_
